ai_ideas.title: Milestone-Based Achievement Path
ai_ideas.description: What if we break this into 6 exciting milestones? Each success builds momentum!

milestones.celebration: Small treat - you're building momentum!
milestones.motivation_message: $500 - The hardest part is starting, and you've done it!

milestones.celebration: Small treat - you're building momentum!
milestones.motivation_message: $1,250 - The hardest part is starting, and you've done it!

milestones.celebration: Nice dinner out - you're halfway there!
milestones.motivation_message: $2,500 - Halfway there! The momentum is building.

milestones.celebration: Weekend getaway - you're in the home stretch!
milestones.motivation_message: $3,750 - Three quarters done! You can see the finish line.

milestones.celebration: Something special - victory is within reach!
milestones.motivation_message: $4,500 - So close you can taste it! Final push!

milestones.celebration: FULL CELEBRATION - you achieved your goal!
milestones.motivation_message: $5,000 - GOAL ACHIEVED! You absolute legend!

details.celebration_plan: Small reward for each milestone hit

ai_ideas.title: Set-It-And-Forget-It Consistency
ai_ideas.description: How about we automate $417/month so you never have to think about it?

details.automation_benefits: Removes decision fatigue and emotional trading
details.flexibility: Can adjust based on income changes

response.text:
I LOVE the milestone approach! Breaking it into chunks feels so much more achievable. 
The automation idea is brilliant too - I'm always busy and forget to invest regularly.
The gamification sounds fun but maybe not my main approach. 
What if we combined milestones with automation? Like auto-invest and celebrate each milestone?
I'm also wondering about the risk - I want to be conservative since this is for a specific goal.

concerns.text: User mentioned 'risk' indicating risk tolerance concerns

custom_ideas:
What if we combined milestones with automation? Like auto-invest and celebrate each milestone?
I'm also wondering about the risk - I want to be conservative since this is for a specific goal
